programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: Outlaw (of Gor)
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Outlaw (of Gor), S05E26, A hero and loser friend are transplanted to the planet of Gor by mysterious forces and are soon caught up in an evil sorcerer's plot of dastardly evil.

MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats, 19950121000000 +0000, After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast. Can desert patrolmen Jim Archer and Joe Dobson stop the creature before it kills again?

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.

programme.title: Lost Continent
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Lost Continent, S02E08, A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

programme.title: The Rebel Set
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Rebel Set, S04E19, Three coffee shop customers help an owner rob an armored car.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K Turkey Day!
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E21, A compilation of new introductions for the infamous Turkey Day marathon as well as a nostalgic look back on the Comedy Central fan-favorite marathon of Mystery Science Theater.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.

programme.title: What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E108, Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Young Man's Fancy
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E24, A story sponsored by the Edison Electric Institute that encourages use of a number of home appliances.
Backlot: MST3K: Santa Versus Satan, S01E33, This episode of Backlot features an interview with some MST3K crew and other experts as they look back at this quirky Rene Cardona-directed movie.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E20, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

Hello, It's Me, 20150927000000 +0000, A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two children on her own meets a handsome, rich man but doesn't feel right about pursuing anything. Stars Kellie Martin and Kavan Smith.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie works her magic to help Sam make a tough decision.

Loving Leah, 20090125000000 +0000, When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith, 20111204000000 +0000, The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

My Boyfriends' Dogs, 20141018000000 +0000, A young woman (Erika Christensen) with three dogs she adopted from past relationships recounts the story of how her search for true love led her to canine companionship.

programme.title: Trials of the Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Jack are closer than ever after their first kiss.

programme.title: Heart and Soul
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Jack remain worlds apart and Abigail finds the truth about Bill.

programme.title: Heart's Desire
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail travels to Hamilton to stay with Elizabeth's family.

Kitten Bowl, 20140202000000 +0000, The greatest feline showdown in cable television history! The competition will consist of two preliminary playoffs and a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern and John Sterling.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Upgrades
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E03, SG-1 is selected to test the effects of alien-tech wristbands on human wearers, and soon find themselves blessed with spectacular strength and speed. But when they are sent on a mission utilizing these new abilities, they learn a shocking lesson.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E04, When a High Priestess from the planet Chulak claims to have a plan that would cripple the Goa'uld, everyone is skeptical. SG-1 must join forces with the Tok'ra in order to put her plan into effect, but a deadly, hidden secret could jeopardize it.

programme.title: Divide And Conquer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E05, When an SGC soldier under the influence of a Goa'uld mind-control device attempts to assassinate a High Council member, SG-1 must uncover other potential assassins, even amongst themselves, before the president arrives for a crucial Summit meeting!

programme.title: Window Of Opportunity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E06, After a visit to a strange planet in the middle of a geomagnetic storm they find themselves repeating the same day over and over again. The team must utilize their accumulated knowledge to stop the time loop before there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E07, SG-1 joins forces with a Russian scientist to investigate a rogue Stargate in Siberia, linked to a mysterious water planet. The team must venture via submarine to the water planet, where they encounter an unexpectedly terrifying alien presence.

programme.title: The First Ones
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E08, During an archaeological survey of fossils on a Goa'uld planet, Daniel is abducted by a fearsome creature, prompting SG-1 to embark on a mission to free him. But Daniel soon learns that the creature's intentions are not what he thought!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E11, When a quirky conspiracy theorist contacts SG-1 claiming to know classified information about the Stargate, at first they think he's bluffing. But when they investigate his wild claims, they realize he's a lot closer to the truth than they thought.

programme.title: Tangent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E12, When O'Neill and Teal'c take an SGC-modified Goa'uld glider out for a test flight, they lose control and are sucked into outer space by a Goa'uld tracking device. It's up to the team to rescue them, before they run out oxygen and life support.

programme.title: The Curse
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E13, When Daniel Jackson returns to Chicago to attend the funeral of his mentor, a celebrated archaeologist, he soon realizes that the death is mysteriously connected to the recent discovery of a 10,000-year-old Egyptian artifact that might be cursed.

programme.title: The Serpent's Venom
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E14, SG-1 travels to a remote interplanetary minefield to sabotage a hazardous alliance between two powerful Goa'uld System Lords. But their mission becomes far more dangerous when they realize Teal'c has been captured by one of the Lords.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E023, The campus is in an uproar when an alleged rapist is released from custody. Despite his alibi, the students are sure that Lenny is responsible for the string of crimes on campus.

programme.title: Unreal World
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E024, A documentary for a class project reveals intimate secrets about the gang and threatens to tear apart some long-standing couples. Meanwhile, Jesse makes a confession to Andrea.

programme.title: A Song For My Mother
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E026, Ray is unhappy that David has come to Portland. David panics when he discovers that his mother was fired, no longer lives at her last known address, and hasn't cashed her alimony checks for months.

programme.title: Squash It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E027, Steve and David organize a hip-hop night at the club to boost the sagging gate receipts. David asks Willie's nephew Juwan, a talented DJ, to join him onstage.

programme.title: Girls On The Side
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E028, Kelly becomes depressed after making the cover of Seventeen, as she fears that she will never regain her past looks.

programme.title: The Real McCoy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E029, While under hyponsis, Dylan recalls a past life as a gunslinger in the Wild West.

programme.title: Hello Life Goodbye Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E030, Dylan asks Kelly to join him on a trip around the world. Valerie sees the tickets in Kelly's room and tells Brandon.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E031, Jim and Cindy leave for Hong Kong. Kelly wants to continue her relationship with Brandon, but he cannot get over the rejected marriage proposal.

programme.title: Home Is Where The Tart Is
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E01, Kelly returns from a modeling stint in New York. Donna enjoys her summer with Ray, who has made an effort to make up for his past mistakes.

programme.title: Everything's Coming Up Roses
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E04, Donna, Kelly, Clare and Valerie try out for the Tournament of Roses Court. Brandon and Susan cover the Rose Court tryouts for the newspaper, and attend the party together. Toni surprises Dylan when they go motorcycle riding.

programme.title: Lover's Leap
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E05, Valerie is haunted by nightmares about her father's suicide. David learns that his mother requires shock therapy to improve her chances of recovery. Toni throws a dinner party while her father is out of town.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E06, Valerie gets herself invited on a road trip with Kelly, Donna and Clare. Steve convinces Brandon to let a director film a movie at the Walsh house. Marchette tells Toni that Dylan is using her.

programme.title: Violated
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E07, Valerie accepts her marketing professor's invitation to a seminar. Bruno delivers a letter from Dylan to Toni. Steve and Clare quarrel after booking a motel room. Donna resists Ray's relentless attempts at a reconciliation.

programme.title: Gypsies, Cramps and Fleas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E08, A fortune teller sets up shop at the Peach Pit for Halloween. In spite of her questionable credibility, her presence has an impact on many couples.

programme.title: Earthquake Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E09, Dylan asks Toni to marry him. An earthquake rocks the major Los Angeles area, spooking Colin. Donna sees her mother in a photograph of the 1969 Rose Court contestants, but Felice refuses to explain herself.

programme.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Carriage Mishap/Stop Drop, Part 2
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E117, Horse and buggy runs out of control pinning driver under buggy/11 year olds playing with matches and gas can accidentally set a child on fire.

programme.title: Australian Balloon/Dr.’s Hay Crush, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E311, A hot air balloon is swept 25 miles out to sea by high winds. A man is injured while trying to move a bail of hay with his tractor.

programme.title: Heart Attack Teacher/Smart Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E147, A high school teacher collapses from a heart attack in a room full of students/ A man wakes up in a room full of smoke and needs to rescue his infant son from another room in the house.

programme.title: Washer Baby/Infrared
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E280, An 18-month old accidentally falls into a washing machine. A neighbor calls 911 to report a break-in at the house next door.

programme.title: Balcony Fall/Bank Capture
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E208, Teen sneaking out to party falls from a fourth-floor balcony. A teller is able to call 911 during a bank robbery.

programme.title: NY Double Roof, Part 2/Rocky Raccoon
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E120, NY City fire traps 2 men Pt. 2 / Raccoon gets head stuck in the tree of a hall

programme.title: Sis Burn Car/Children’s Doc
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E115, Mom caught in burning car / Visiting children's national medical center in DC

programme.title: Phoenix Flood, Part 2/Toddler Glass
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E204, A woman driving through the desert is swept away during a flash flood. A child fell through a plate glass window.

programme.title: Fire Ant/Spiderman Rescue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E123, 26-month-old baby falls into a swarm of fire ants/Woman trapped on the ledge of apartment building 20 ft. up.

programme.title: Trading Places/Mystery Dispatch
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E334, A 73-year-old Vermont resident is held at knifepoint by an escaped prisoner. Virginia emergency workers receive an unusual call.

programme.title: Christina’s Call/Penny Choke
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E350, A 7-year old girl calls 911 when the father begins to attack her mother. A man helps save his 11-month old nephew who is choking.

programme.title: Killing Plane/Teen Car, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E316, A pilot of a small plane crashes during icy weather. Teenagers lose control of their car and tumble down a ditch.

programme.title: Peep Prowler/Sister Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E162, The police are dispatched to investigate a peeping tom. Young sisters are trapped in burning house

programme.title: Snomo’s Thru Ice/Russia

programme.title: Home Cort
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E14, Mitch gets a surprise visit from his old, mischievous Navy S.E.A.L. buddy and ex-Baywatch lifeguard, John Cort, adding serious problems in their already complicated relationship. And Shauni and Jill fight a battle of the sexes against a shady vendor.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.

programme.title: Muddy Waters
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E16, Cort and Eddie train lifeguards at a water park, but someone is vandalizing the waterslides, putting people's lives in danger. Meanwhile, Captain Thorpe wants Shauni fired for posing in a provocative calendar.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E17, Eddie and Cort happen upon an illegal gambling ship. Meanwhile, Mitch begins to spend more time with Hobie's English teacher – a liaison that embarrasses Hobie beyond belief.

programme.title: Eclipse
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E18, After losing his rookie partner in the mysterious rescue of what he thinks is a ghost, Eddie gets unwittingly caught up in a 70-year-old legend. Meanwhile, Hobie attempts to help a friend find a new home for her dog.

programme.title: Shark Derby
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E19, A local restaurateur puts up a $25,000 bounty for the largest shark caught during the weekend's Shark Derby he's sponsoring. To attract more sharks, he illegally chums the waters, drawing hundreds of sharks uncommonly close to shore.

programme.title: The Big Race
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E20, Cort promises to come up with $10,000 for a nursing home, but he needs Mitch and Craig's help to compete in a water-skiing race with a big cash prize. Shauni’s traumatic fear of the ocean after Jill’s death threatens her future with Baywatch.

programme.title: Old Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E21, Craig, Mitch, and Garner go for a weekend hang-gliding trip, but Mitch has a serious accident, and ends up facing death before the fangs of a rattlesnake! Cort reacquaints himself with a woman who has a shocking secret.

programme.title: The End?
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E22, A massive earthquake destroys Baywatch headquarters and leaves Gina's life hanging in the balance. Meanwhile, Cort and Craig are trapped in the ocean. And Eddie is the only one left who can help a pregnant woman going into labor.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E01, Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E02, When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the “Creature in the Bay” is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E03, After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence – unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Money, Honey
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E04, After Mitch makes a heroic ocean rescue while working at her private beach party, a Hollywood producer offers Mitch the starring role in a movie. Meanwhile, Harvey and Shauni hold a wild bikini contest to raise money for an aquatic rescue group.

programme.title: The Fabulous Buchannon Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E05, Mitch receives an unexpected visit from his free-spirited brother, whose troubled son entices Hobie to surf the pylons of a treacherous condemned pier. Meanwhile, a local vendor nearly causes a riot when his bikinis disintegrate in the water.

programme.title: Point of Attack
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E06, After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.

programme.title: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E07, Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”

programme.title: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E08, Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life-threatening. Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.
